mapper.select: SELECT om.order_id, om.member_id, om.delivery_id , om.order_md_cnt, om.order_amt, om.discount_amt, om.pay_amt , om.order_date, om.order_status , coco.code_name order_status_name , od.order_detail_id, od.md_id , od.order_detail_qty, od.order_detail_price, od.order_detail_amt , od.order_detail_discount, od.order_detail_discount_amt, od.order_detail_pay_amt , md.md_name , md.md_thumbnail_name, md.md_thumbnail_path , da.receiver, da.member_phone, da.post_code, da.delivery_addr1, da.delivery_addr2 FROM order_main om, order_detail od, md md, delivery da, member m , common_code coco where om.order_id = #{order_id} and om.member_id = #{member_id} and om.member_id = m.member_id and om.order_id = od.order_id and od.md_id = md.md_id and om.delivery_id = da.delivery_id and coco.code_class = 'order_status' and om.order_status = coco.code_id order by od.order_detail_id desc
